Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video shows mob violence at Bandra Kurla Complex in Mumbai, when in reality it shows a protest over mob lynching in Surat.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading Facebook post and does not provide any other evidence to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is related to mob violence at Bandra Kurla Complex without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the video, which is that it shows a protest over mob lynching in Surat, as supported by the evidence of the bus registration plates and the word 'Sitilink' on the bus.
Understate: The claim understates the significance of the video, as it falsely attributes it to mob violence at Bandra Kurla Complex instead of accurately describing it as a protest over mob lynching in Surat.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting false information about the location and context of the video.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
